pr_title: fix: Add Visualization support to Dashboard search and removing .hbm files [DHIS2-7946]

timeline.message:
feat: Merge Chart + ReportTable [DHIS2-7946]

Create the  new Visualization object to unify Chart and ReportTable. This is the initial commit including the CRUD and small changes in Interpretation.

feat: (2.34) Adding Flyway for Visualization tables [DHIS2-7946]

Adding the Flyway scripts for the new Visualization tables.

feat: (2.34) Replacing ReportTable references [DHIS2-7946]

Replacing all ReportTable references by the new Visualization object.

feat: (2.34) Add Visualization to Dashboard [DHIS2-7946]

This is an initial commit to support the Visualization in the Dashboard.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
feat: Draft Dashboard support for Visualization [DHIS2-7946]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

feat: Adding migration scripts + fixes [DHIS2-7946]

Adding initial versions of the migration scripts along with some fixes for the new tables.

feat: Fixing Hibernate mappings and model [DHIS2-7946]

Unifying the cumulative column and fixing the reporting params.

feat: Fixing migration script [DHIS2-7946]

Fixing invalid column name when updating the dashboarditem table.

feat: Reverting Chart/ReportTable code [DHIS2-7946]

Adding back some code to minimize impacts in ReportTable/Chart.

feat: Migration for Report table [DHIS2-7946]

Another Flyway script to pupulate the Report table with the correct Visualization ids.

feat: Improving and unifying Flyway scripts [DHIS2-7946]

Unifying the data migration scripts into one and adding default values for null boolean columns and publicaccess.

feat: Set default values for numeric columns [DHIS2-7946]

Adding UPDATE statements to set default values for primitive numeric columns.

feat: Adding support for custom Axes [DHIS2-7946]

Adding support for custom Axes into Visualization. This is the old Series from Chart.

feat: Adding migreation for series items [DHIS2-7946]

Including the migration for series items into axis table.

feat: Emptying Visualization in Hibernate dbms [DHIS2-7946]

Adding the new Visualization tables into the HibernateDbmsManager cleaning routine.

feat: Remove public prefixes from Flyway scripts [DHIS2-7946]

Small change to remove the DB public schema from Flyway scripts.

feat: JFreeChart not supported to Visualization [DHIS2-7946]

Adding a comment to make explicit that Visualization does not support image/file generation.

feat: Improving axis naming [DHIS2-7946]

Renaming axis to optionalAxis as this is a very specific option.

feat: Support Visualization in DataStatistics [DHIS2-7946]

Adding Visualization into the DataStatistics flow along with Flyway migrations.

feat: Increasing endpoint version [DHIS2-7946]

Increasing the endpoint version to v34. Also reverting a code change mistake.

feat: Removing ownership from migrations [DHIS2-7946]

Fixing creation of tables. Removing ownership assignment.

feat: Removing ownership from migrations [DHIS2-7946]

Fixing creation of tables. Removing ownership assignment.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

feat: Removing non-used column [DHIS2-7946]

Removing the categorycomboid column from the migration as it's not being mapped anywhere.

feat: Removing others unused DB columns [DHIS2-7946]

Columns that are not present in the integration tests DB are removed.

feat: Adding fix for NPE [DHIS2-7946]

Initializaing the Axes list and avoid a NPE later on the flow.

feat: Adding code review improvements [DHIS2-7946]

Addressing the initial code review changes raised by Luciano (2.34).
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

(2.34) Upgrading migration versions [DHIS2-7946]

Updating the versions as other PRs have already got the previous versions.

feat: (2.34) Code review typo fix [DHIS2-7946]

Tiny fix for a typo in the Javadoc.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

feat: (2.34) Fixing Report references to Visualization [DHIS2-7946]

Switching some Report references to the new ReportingParams object related to Visualization.

feat: (2.34) Fixing failing tests [DHIS2-7946]

Reverting a few changes to keep Report compatibility and fix failing tests.
feat: Unit test for Visualization/Grid generation [DHIS2-7946]

feat: (2.34) Code clean up in the Controller [DHIS2-7946]

Just a small code clean up in the VisualizationController.

Merge branch 'DHIS2-7946' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

feat: Reverting null checkings [DHIS2-7946]

Removing additional  null, added previously as part of theis task.
(feat) Merging master into [DHIS2-7946]
Merge with master
Merge with master
feat: Removing unnecessary SQL statement and TODO comment [DHIS2-7946]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

feat: Upgrading Flyway script versions [DHIS2-7946]

Updating the versions so we avoid conflicts with other branches which are already using these versions.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
feat: Updating schema desc. to support r/w access [DHIS2-7946]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
feat: Adding Façade to support ReportTable API [DHIS2-7946]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

feat: Fixing Interpretation API [DHIS2-7946]

Adding migration for Interpretation and small code improvements/fixes.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
feat: Supporting the old Charts API [DHIS2-7946]

feat: Removing FKs from Intepretation table [DHIS2-7946]

The chart and reporttable FKs are no longer required and need to be dropped in favour of Visualization.
feat: Add IF EXISTS checking to FK removal [DHIS2-7946]
feat: Clean-up related to PIE/GAUGE data [DHIS2-7946]
feat: Make Interpretation backward compatible [DHIS2-7946]
feat: Adding support for old char/reportTable [DHIS2-7946]

feat: Adding support for old Chart and ReportTable [DHIS2-7946]

This will keep backward compatibility until the Visualization is fully migrated.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
fix: Changing flyway script version to avoid conflict [DHIS2-7946]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

fix: Add Visualization support to Dashboard search and removing .hbm files

Backward support for Dashboard search and removal of Chart and ReportTable hbm files. Also include some small fixes for issues found during tests.
feat: Merging master into [DHIS2-7946]
fix: Reverting changing mistake [DHIS2-7946]
fix: Tiny bug fix regarding Chart reporting [DHIS2-7946]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-7946

+package org.hisp.dhis.visualization;
+
+import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
+import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.xml.annotation.JacksonXmlProperty;
+import org.hisp.dhis.common.BaseIdentifiableObject;
+import org.hisp.dhis.common.DxfNamespaces;
+import org.hisp.dhis.common.annotation.Description;
+
+public class SimpleVisualizationView extends BaseIdentifiableObject {
+
+    private VisualizationType type;
+
+    @JsonProperty
+    @JacksonXmlProperty( namespace = DxfNamespaces.DXF_2_0 )
+    @Description( "The type of the Visualization object. Only used for Visualization objects." )
+    public VisualizationType getType() {

timeline.bodyText: Instead of converting "real-time", should we instead convert dashboard items once with Flyway?
timeline.author: larshelge

timeline.bodyText: Could we add a description at the class level with the purpose of this class?

 import org.hisp.dhis.common.annotation.Description;
 
+/**
+ * This class is just a wrapper class to provide a simplified summary view of
+ * the Visualization object. It will only contains the BaseIdentifiableObject
+ * attributes plus a minimum amount of attributes from Visualization.
+ */
 public class SimpleVisualizationView
     extends
